comment._content: Nice moustache but look at the hairdo on Mrs. Hickey?  Remember that that confection was put together without the assistance of hairspray, gels and the like, nice work!!!!

comment._content: His ring is on the small finger, seems to have had an accident and the tops of the other fingers are missing.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/patvic67] Do you think? I thought it was just how his hand was curled, and it's not too unusual for men (to this day) to wear a signet ring on their pinkie.
